directUrls.title: Direct hotel URLs
directUrls.description: Extract data from specific hotel pages directly. When provided, location search is bypassed.
directUrls.sectionDescription: Configure search parameters or provide direct URLs

searchQuery.title: Location Search
searchQuery.description: Destination to search for hotels on Google (city, region, or landmark). Optional when using direct URLs.

checkInDate.title: Check-in date
checkInDate.description: Check-in date for hotels search. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

checkOutDate.title: Check-out date
checkOutDate.description: Check-out date for hotels search. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

numberOfAdults.title: Number of adults
numberOfAdults.description: Number of adults for hotels search.

numberOfChildren.title: Number of children
numberOfChildren.description: Number of children for hotels search.

numberOfRooms.title: Number of rooms
numberOfRooms.description: Number of rooms for hotels search.

sortBy.title: Sort results by
sortBy.description: How to sort the hotel results.

hotelClass.title: Hotel class (star rating)
hotelClass.description: Filter hotels by star rating. Select multiple to include various classes.

maxResults.title: Maximum Hotels to Extract
maxResults.description: Set a limit on the number of hotels to process. Leave empty to extract all available results.

proxyConfig.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfig.description: This is required if you want to use Apify Proxy.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler.
